website_summaries.verdict: Attractive retail price and great aesthetics. Users may have to do some minor modifications to improve functionality and durability, but the final results should be worth the time and effort.
pros: Simple but stylish design stands 35" from ground
Generous 36" round fire pit for hardwood
Mesh lifting tool and protective grates are included
cons: No water drainage holes provided by manufacturer
Thinner metal rusts easily and can be damaged during shipment
Some plastic parts are exposed to heat

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fire Pit - Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Item worked well for what we needed it for. We built a stone fire pit and used this as an insert so it would be easier to clean. It's also nice to have the cover on top. The metal however is pretty thin so as a stand alone piece it looks good, but may not stand up to much abuse. I would also recommend purchasing a cover or drill a small hole to let the water escape so it doesn't rust. I still think it's a good value and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine J.

customer_reviews.title: Terribly made
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that was sent to me and was defective. The legs weren't split or the screw wasn't long enough either way both times I ordered the legs would not go together!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Duncan

customer_reviews.title: I really like it! It is thin but I bought a ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like it! It is thin but I bought a cover to protect it. The diameter is bigger than I expected but that has worked out well. After reading other negative reviews of this, I can definitely understand where most folks are coming from with the thinness but for $69 bucks its a good deal. I would suggest for others considering this product, don't have a high intensity fire for hours on end with this particular pit as it is not a thick cast iron and will corrode through. But it's perfect patio fire pit to relax and have a glass of wine by with friends and family or to roast marshmallows with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Arrived warped and dented
customer_reviews.text: Made of very thin metal. Due to this and poor packaging it arrived warped and dented. I would not recommend purchasing this fire pit as I have read other similar reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: The fire pit was dented on two sides when I received it.
customer_reviews.text: The fire pit was dented a little on two sides when I received it. My husband didn't want to go thru the hastle of packing it back up & returning that big box, so we kept it. It looks like there is no more in stock anymore anyway. We did use the fire pit once already, & it does seem to work well. I was wondering if the sellers are reading this, if we can get some kind of credit back for the dents? I took a picture with my phone of the dents, but I am not computer savvy. I didn't know how to send it to you.
customer_reviews.author: rose lord

customer_reviews.title: Treated with heat resistant paint -we’ll see how long this thing lasts
customer_reviews.text: November 2018: So folks - you get what you pay for. Made in China, arrived with a couple scratches on the back this isnt solid cast-iron, so it is very light weight. I took the advice of someone else and used heat resistant spray paint on it (see pictures). Giving four stars because it arrived with the scratch and I’m not sure how tough this things going to be
customer_reviews.author: MNG

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product!
customer_reviews.text: Shop for a product other than this one! 1) The diameter of the cover was too small and did not fit the fire “bowl” ring. 2) Two of the four threads to accept thumb screws for the stand attachment were cross-threaded. 3) The fire “bowl” and cover are made with very thin material and quite flimsy. 4) Grate material is made with small diameter rod and susceptible to bending.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Guy

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: This is very serviceable fire pit that has hosted multiple outdoor gatherings in the outdoor space behind my apartment in Brooklyn, and has also endured a northeast winter spent contending with the elements. I suppose that if you are looking for something to support a larger bon-fire (where the focus is the fire itself), then this is probably not your option. But for this very affordable price, you will get an entirely suitable, functional fire pit to help add a little rusticity to an urban environment.
customer_reviews.author: NGM

customer_reviews.title: Lasted much longer than expected!
customer_reviews.text: We used this fire pit for several years and although it feels somewhat flimsy, it was very durable and I like the width. The screen cover rusted relatively quickly, but it was exposed to the weather year round so that was not unexpected. I drilled three small holes in the bottom of the base so any moisture would be able to drain. Maybe that is why it took several years for the bottom to rust out. This is a very good product for the price. Just ordered again and looking forward to some nice Fall fires!
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: I guess I should have known better because sometimes you really do get what you pay ...
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have known better because sometimes you really do get what you pay for. This fire pit is so flimsy that it might as well come with folding legs and be portable. I am so disappointed! The bowl is very shallow and if it gets really windy it could be a mess or worse... Ugh
customer_reviews.author: alar1976

customer_reviews.title: Best one for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit! It is big and holds a lot of wood. The base is sturdy and it assembled in about 10 minutes. The top is sturdy and it has not turned colors after using it with a pretty big fire! I would recommend this unit. No, it does not have a hole in the bottom to drain any water, but you could easily drill one or just buy a cover. We opted for a cover.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Peek

customer_reviews.title: Overall its pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Had a couple issues with assembly. One (or maybe two) of the legs were cut wrong so where they overlap to bolt in don't fit together right. I had to bend one of the legs to make it fit into the slot and now as a result the fire pit doesn't sit completely flat. Fire pit still works as its not a huge issue but still an annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Casey From Ohio

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The item had a noticeable dent and scratch on the outside when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Where is Norman

customer_reviews.title: Fire Sense Roman Fire Pit.
customer_reviews.text: I had this Roman Fire Pit for a few weeks now and I'm really pleased. Had a couple of pretty hot fires going in it and it still looks great. I empty the ashes the next day and keep it under roof on my patio, looks neat sitting there. I just make sure it's out of the rain. Really happy with it. I think it's a good deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Z

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and delighted with first fire in this fire pit
customer_reviews.text: It was larger than I expected and delighted with our first fire in it last week. I ordered a cover for it a couple days later as it was going to rain. I didn't want the ashes to get wet and hopefully that would also keep it from rusting inside. Definitely going to enjoy this fire pit (live in Az. so ideal weather for "campfires."
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and nice fir the price too
customer_reviews.text: A Nice and bug fir group to enjoy nestled around it. Suggestion: look for Weber grill top a cover to better protectgrill from rain or wood becoming too damp. Tip: used Doritos as a fire starter, wood was damp and lighting Doritos did the job after trying other methods.
customer_reviews.author: Marien

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED/BENT
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my in-laws who hosted my wedding. I had it shipped to their house and when I arrived to set it up I discovered dents, scratches and bent pieces of metal. We didn't have time to replace it so with time and sweat I was able to bend it and push the dents out enough for it to work. I feel bad that their "gift" end up being so damaged. We will have to get them something else now I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Hay

customer_reviews.title: Great firepit!
customer_reviews.text: We love this firepit! Since we got it , we have been enjoying numerous s'mores nights with our kids and their friends. Easy to setup and move around, and the best part about it is that the edges of the firepit do not get hot at all, avoiding any burns. To protect it from rain water accumulating, we got a fabric cover, which works great.
customer_reviews.author: Marilena Bratut

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control and shipping. Waste of time & Effort.
customer_reviews.text: Wrong parts delivered (2 of same of support legs instead of one of each type..can't screw together as incorrect parts packaged & delivered). Bowl caved in & side badly bent.
customer_reviews.author: vaneau

customer_reviews.title: Great design and size
customer_reviews.text: Great design. I've bought 3 of these... mostly for the size and simple design. It is a bit on the light side, but great value for the money. I would poke holes at the bottom so water can drain.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Already rusting, heat burns the grass underneath through container ...
customer_reviews.text: Already rusting, heat burns the grass underneath through container, and only used it twice so far and it's already going downhill
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: WYSIWYG👍
customer_reviews.text: I just got an opportunity to use this last week. It was perfect. It totally met my expectations, super easy to put together. I’m satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KMart

customer_reviews.title: What did they paint it with? Paint smoking off.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking. Easy to assemble. Really nice fires. But, the paint bakes off and smells like burning plastic. I would have assumed they would have painted it with a heat resistant paint. You can actually see the paint smoking off the bottom of it. Hoping it stops after this second fire. Don’t see anyone else mentioning this so perhaps they changed the paint recently. Considered sending it back but it took forever to get here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ok product
customer_reviews.text: out of the box the rim of the pit was bent. we were able to bend it back. there was a plastic connector that sits under the cover, doesn't make much sense because the cover/screen is over a fire, my husband opted for a metal washer vs this plastic one to avoid melting!
customer_reviews.author: BostonG

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the price! It took about 6 minutes to put together with no tools! My only complaint is that it should have a hole in the bottom to drain water when it rains. I'm sure the manufacturer must have heard this before. If the hole was there, I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bill M

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking at first
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking at first, but after minimal use it began to rust. Also the top ring used to move the lid broke off when we were putting it together. Tried emailing the company for a replacement part, but they never got back to us. Now the top is bent, torn, and rusted. This thing is total garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bear

customer_reviews.title: Just right.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on expected date and in good condition. It is the right size for my use in my mobile home Park. The Roman design adds a little flair to most plain fire pits. Used once already so I don't have information on longevity use. I'm pleased at this point in time and expect it will bring me plenty of "campfires" just off my patio!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Updegraff

customer_reviews.title: I love this fire pit!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fire pit! My husband bought it for me as a Christmas present. It works great. I get good heat from the fire on a chilly night, and it burns quickly, so no need to leave half burned wood in it overnight. The screen works well to keep flying embers out of the air and the tool to remove the screen and stoke the fire is a nice length. Very nice basic product!
customer_reviews.author: Razorbacks92

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this product
customer_reviews.text: Total garbage! Rusted immediately after 1st use! Never had a fire pit do this, waste of $75
customer_reviews.author: David Jarboe

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy. Was my daughter's Christmas gift. Box looked fine but has a huge dent. They want it sent back but I can't tell who pays shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Pursley

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: While not very expensive, this is a great firepit, that I converted to propane, and does a wonderful job... well made, great buy for the money,, need to purchase the waterproof cover to keep it looking great for years
customer_reviews.author: Gary M Pirkle

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional with easy assembly!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute and functional firepit! Assembly was incredibly simple and quick. Makes a great addition to my patio set!
customer_reviews.author: Celesta Nagel

customer_reviews.title: Smoking Hot!
customer_reviews.text: You won't be disappointed about the size or style of the Fire Sense 60857 Roman Fire Pit, Brushed Bronze.
customer_reviews.author: Penny L.

customer_reviews.title: JUST A REGULAR FIREPIT
customer_reviews.text: Came already assembled, seems a bit unsturdy, very lightweight. Thought it might be a bit larger and deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Mike 777

customer_reviews.title: The box came looking like the postal office used it as a quarterback for ...
customer_reviews.text: The box came looking like the postal office used it as a quarterback for their office football game. Small bends on the face of the bowl, but easily belt back to shape. Easy to assemble, cheap, probably not going to last forever but it wasn't expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: it is nice to sit around a fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Even though we are in Florida, it is nice to sit around a fire pit. This one is sturdy, but light weight enough for one person to move it around. It should last for years. We hope for a cool fall to get more use out of it. It stays outside all year with a heavy duty cover.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great fire pit but make sure to use it on concrete or rocks, not grass or turf
customer_reviews.text: Effective fire pit, I have it in my backyard and light it up every so often. But be careful about what you put it on. My roommates lit a fire with the turf underneath it and it melted through the turf. An expensive mistake, but just be aware that this pit gives off a lot of heat at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: gpapadin

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: The base was wonky so we just used our old base and thankfully it fit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's light
customer_reviews.text: It's light & easy to move around. Bought it for my campground to use wherever needed. It brings people joy to sit in front of a campfire.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Normoyle

customer_reviews.title: rusts quickly
customer_reviews.text: The fire pit started to rust soon after the first rain. The screen rusts too. I drilled some holes in the bottom of the pit as it would fill up with water when it rained. I sanded and spray painted (several coats) the entire pit and screen with rustoleum. It still started to rust some, especially the screen. I no longer use the screen and use a solid lid from an old pit to keep out most of the rain and keep the ash in place. The rust isn't too bad on the pit itself but I don't see it lasting more than a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Rhode Islander

customer_reviews.title: Love it - could buy again
customer_reviews.text: Had five fires in it so far and love it
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Will not last long as material is very thin and paint even worse...
customer_reviews.text: These surely will not last long as material is very thin and paint even worse. Also damaged from poor packaging coming all the way from China. Cover will help but as usual you get what you pay for and these are only worth $30-$40 max. !
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice on cool nights
customer_reviews.text: This is a good fire pit for the price. It works well. I keep it covered when it's not being used.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Olivas

customer_reviews.title: I gave this three stars since it is functional and ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this three stars since it is functional and does what it says it will but I found it very unattractive and there were issues with the coating as if it were smeared. I went cheap and you can tell.
customer_reviews.author: Murray

customer_reviews.title: Made of very thin metal but nice unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Made of very thin metal but nice unit for the price. You wouldn't want to build huge, hot fires in this and leave it outside all the time as it wouldn't last long. However, for small fires on a deck its perfect. Put it under cover in the offseason and it should last a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Banditrider

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts, rim bent
customer_reviews.text: It was missing the 4 wing screws for fastening the legs to the bowl, and and the ring screw and nut for the screen. Also the carton it came in took a beating because the rim was bent in several places.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Came Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer shipped this missing parts. It is average value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the cheaper fire pits but it has done everything I have wanted it to do. Not sure how long it will last as the material is not the strongest but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: ross

customer_reviews.title: They love it and use it regularly
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a wedding shower gift for friends of ours. They love it and use it regularly. Note that this arrived in original packaging, not an amazon box, so be aware if you are buying this as a gift for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Robinson Family

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Love this fire pit. It has a great look and is perfect for a small patio area. When it arrived it was missing a small piece ( the loop handle). I phoned the customer service number for the manufacturer and was send the part within a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hardware does not fit
customer_reviews.text: The product looks great and adds a coziness to our backyard setting on these fall nights. Although it came with all the parts, the screws (as I read in other reviews) are not long enough to assemble the legs to the base. Had to go out and purchase the hardware that would fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Nice little pit
customer_reviews.text: Simple assembly. Great for a small backyard fire, although you could get a good size fire going if you wanted. Would recommend you put down some bricks on the ground to place the fire pit on. The mesh cover helps keep the "fire flies" down, but it is a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: ryan mayberry

customer_reviews.title: works as directed but a bit shallow
customer_reviews.text: Works as directed, but the pit is a bit shallow.
customer_reviews.author: Salguod

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was the first fire pit I ever bought so I wasn’t sure what to expect. It was quite easy for me to put together by myself. We used it several times over the summer and thought it was great! I am not sure how it would stand up to heavy use but that’s not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: MeghanBrei

customer_reviews.title: after having our first fire with this pit I would NOT recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Before taking the fire pit out of the box, I noticed scratching on the underside of the bowl. It would not be noticeable while having a fire so I left that slide at first. However, after having our first fire with this pit I would NOT recommend it to anyone. Yes, it did it's job, but after cleaning out the pit, the paint on the inside of the bowl is already chipping over 1/3 of the bowl. This was a father's day gift and I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Charity Risko

customer_reviews.title: Easy, light, solid made and brings a lot of warmth.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, Awesome! Love it! We have been spending a lot of evenings just by the fire. Easy to maintain and to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Izzi

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to take along on camping trips. Love this firepit. I bought one for each of my daughters as well.
customer_reviews.author: adfallon68

customer_reviews.title: It has a nice screen top to contain any sparks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fire pit to take with us on camping trips. It has a nice screen top to contain any sparks. We use it for ambiance effect. It was easy to clean after use. This is a nice portable fire pit that can be used as a grill or just to sit around and enjoy the flames of a nice fire. The price was just right for the size.
customer_reviews.author: JR Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials :-(
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap for a reason... I’ve have this for a couple of months. The piece of junk is already rusted through the bottom. Other than a little rain, it has been dry here. I woild pay more for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Loomis

customer_reviews.title: The fire pit came with parts that don't actually fit ...
customer_reviews.text: The fire pit came with parts that don't actually fit. See picture. We had to get our own screw to put it together. Looking back at the pictures, if you zoom in, you can see that some have the part (picture with chairs) and others don't. Also, the first time you use it, the smell is awful from the finish burning off. It's functional, but I wish I'd bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: m.ost

customer_reviews.title: Firepit arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived damaged, but the box was fully intact. Fire Sense will not return our calls. The fire pit was easy to assemble and lightweight, but the pan was dented causing the screen not to fit properly. We are very unsatisfied with the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Beth H.

customer_reviews.title: Just ok, not great
customer_reviews.text: Grate is way too small for the bowl. Overall quality is low. Glad I paid much less than the list price. I don't expect this to last more than one summer, but it'll get us through until we build a brick fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Great fire pit
customer_reviews.text: This is our second purchase of this fire pit. The first one lasted 10 years with repeated use. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Steinmetz

customer_reviews.title: Big is good. Finish is less than ideal.
customer_reviews.text: Bigger size is good. Seems sturdy. Finish definitely isn’t nearly as good as pictured. Still worth the bigger size at this price overall
customer_reviews.author: David Butler

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was fine, went together easily without any need for tools
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was fine, went together easily without any need for tools. Has a nice appearance and is lighweight. It does rock a little, but that is no bother. For the price, I would be ok if it only holds up a few seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Greg L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but needs drain holes
customer_reviews.text: This firepit is very stylish. Very easy to put together and build a fire in. I took one star off because there are no drain holes and everytime it rains, it fills with water. It was an easy fix as my husband drilled a few small holes in the bottom. Overall a nice pit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. It's very light weight (it's $60 so you shouldn't expect wrought iron) and easy to ensemble. Perfect if you are not looking to use a fire pit 4+ days a week since it's easy to move in and out of storage as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea G.

customer_reviews.title: Right price. Right product
customer_reviews.text: Very light material. A youngster can carry it. Easy to put together. Big enough for your basic shmore campfire.
customer_reviews.author: Jato

customer_reviews.title: Made a nice fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Large. Made a nice fire pit. Not a heavy type of metal, and it was scratched when it arrived, but not so bad as to go through the hassle of returning it. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christmas shopper

customer_reviews.title: Got a lot of compliments
customer_reviews.text: Looks classy, the top is rarely used though for me. I like bigger fires than the lid can handle haha but it makes it look nicer with it on when I'm not using it or when there's company
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put together, seems sturdy and has a nice rustic look and is big enough for anything u need to do with it
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Great Fire Pit for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fire pit for the money! Have seen similar at stores for twice as much. I have seen some complaints about the quality but I have had no issues. I haven't gotten a cover for it yet so I bring it under cover when it rains but you can't beat it for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Chris MacMillan

customer_reviews.title: Delightful Purchase :)
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't purchase this as some reported that the material was very flimsy.... however, I found it to be well made. I am so happy that I took the chance and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna H.

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and usability. It’s perfect for my backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Phelps

customer_reviews.title: The product is great. However
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. However, it was delivered a day late so we didn't get to have a campfire during the party. They also make it very difficult to submit a late delivery comment without having to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Martell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we were looking for when we decided to have some friends & family over. Perfect size (for an average backyard) & looks great too! I will say that I do wish I would've known that it would burn the grass but I guess that's with anything hot sitting directly on top of it. No worries tho.. now our lil' fire pit has a designated area in the backyard;)
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: VERY Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift! Really nice. Now if we could just get the Oklahoma wind to cooperate so we could use!
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa3447

customer_reviews.title: Overall it's a good size, but it would be better if it ...
customer_reviews.text: I use as an insert for a firepit. Overall it's a good size, but it would be better if it had drain holes already in the bottom. I'm sure it would work great as a patio fire pit if you store inside.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Read reviews!!!
customer_reviews.text: box arrived looking fine. Bowl was severely crushed. Cheep material. Got one at Home Depot for same price and 5 times better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the screw bolt holding it together was defective. I was unable to get a replacement screw through Amazon because of the way automatic feedback is set up. I did not wanted to return it. I just wanted the screw holding it together replaced. My husband rigged it. I was unable to get on through the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Luckyeye

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a gift..
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been too hot for our friend to use, but, it's very pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Pullaro

customer_reviews.title: This was flimsy and cheaply made. I should have ...
customer_reviews.text: This was flimsy and cheaply made. I should have returned it. I did not get my moneys worth on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chandi

customer_reviews.title: Burn... BURN!
customer_reviews.text: After a few fires and rain it has started to rust, but it still holds together. After buying this my family uses it more than I do.
customer_reviews.author: Bradly Haubert

customer_reviews.title: Decent but make a drain hole or get a cover
customer_reviews.text: So far has been a nice unit, however it collects water since there are no drain holes integrated in it. So I suggest drilling a small hole or better solution get a cover.
customer_reviews.author: Brady C.

customer_reviews.title: Missing item part (part h) decorative screws. Otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a decent product, can't wait to use it, just one problem. The "decorative screw" used to hold the leg pieces together was missing. Would give it 5 stars if I can get one sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap at all.
customer_reviews.text: We love this but have only used it once. Got told by my Landlord it wasn't aloud. So it's in storage waiting for the day it can be pulled out and used again. Great product though!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: this firepit is beautiful - looks so good! Cant wait to use it minor assembly needed but it looks wonderful
customer_reviews.author: SFamily

customer_reviews.title: Plan to fix the rim damaged in shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this seems like a great fire pit. Mine arrived in a damaged and opened box. The rim was bent clearly from being dropped in shipment. Luckily it is a fairly easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Hall

customer_reviews.title: A great fire pit for the money
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit is a good size. It will hold about 4 pieces of split wood at a time. It works well and makes a nice fire. We keep the cover off until we want the fire to go out.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: This fills up with rain water. It is too large for most covers and still is a pain. It turned to rust within the first year
customer_reviews.author: Jack Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Camping in queens.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great item. Used in the back yard and with the cover makes it like we are camping. We make smores and roast almost anything with the great smokey wood flavor.
customer_reviews.author: frank walston

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice fire pit compared to other we have purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice fire pit compared to other we have purchased. Just the right size and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Esme Cantu

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful and sturdy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and sturdy for the price. I keep it out of the rain as reviews suggest and haven't seen rust yet!
customer_reviews.author: GhstChild

customer_reviews.title: Nice but light weight
customer_reviews.text: Nice but light weight. I put a large stone in it to keep it from blowing away during a potential micro-burst. Looks good, holds a decent fire and gives us warmth in a cool evening (50s in Phoenix area).
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Them

customer_reviews.title: It would be better if it had a water prof top for when not in use
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved it but I do not think of the way she uses it or keeps it
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: Roman fire pit
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a house we rented out in the Hamptons for a month, it suited us perfectly, easy to put together and cost effective, we left it with the homeowners.
customer_reviews.author: Missfitz

customer_reviews.title: A fair price for a fair fire pit appliance
customer_reviews.text: Fair quality for a fair appliance.] Metal is lightweight but nicely finished. Put it away in winter weather.
customer_reviews.author: P. Bronson

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome firepit for the price point
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome firepit for the price point. No regrets purchasing it. It sits by the pool to create a cool pool effect or we can throw a couple of logs into it and cook smores with the kids. Great pit!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Z.

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift and everyone loved it! Perfect for the price, also purchased a cover to keep it from rusting out. Great size and look.
customer_reviews.author: L. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: really bad box
customer_reviews.text: Some assembly required. Anybody know how to unbend a piece of metal after it gets smashed in a clamp lift?
customer_reviews.author: Karen

product_meta.title: Fire Sense 60857 Roman Fire Pit, Brushed Bronze
product_meta.description: This unique fire pit features a 35" high temp antique bronze painted steel fire bowl with hammered lip, and brushed painted steel legs. This fire pit comes complete with mesh fire screen with high heat paint and a wood grate. Also included is a screen lift tool.
feature_bullets: 35" high temperature antique bronze steel fire bowl with hammered lip
One-piece mesh spark screen with high temperature paint
Screen lift tool and wood grate included

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
